metadata.title: CVE-2019-3886 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An incorrect permissions check was discovered in libvirt 4.8.0 and above. The readonly permission was allowed to invoke APIs depending on the guest agent, which could lead to potentially disclosing unintended information or denial of service by causing libvirt to block.

notes.note: mdeslaur> only a DoS, no information disclosure

criterions.comment: libvirt package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-0ubuntu1').
